remarks: Lemma for ~ dchrisum0 .  Apply ~ dchrisum for the function ` 1 / sqrt y ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2016.)
statement:
rpvmasum.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Z ) $.
rpvmasum.a $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
rpvmasum2.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
rpvmasum2.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
rpvmasum2.1 $e |- .1. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
rpvmasum2.w $e |- W = { y e. ( D \ { .1. } ) | sum_ m e. NN ( ( y ` ( L ` m ) ) / m ) = 0 } $.
dchrisum0.b $e |- ( ph -> X e. W ) $.
dchrisum0lem1.f $e |- F = ( a e. NN |-> ( ( X ` ( L ` a ) ) / ( sqrt ` a ) ) ) $.
dchrisum0lema $p |- ( ph -> E. t E. c e. ( 0 [,) +oo ) ( seq 1 ( + , F ) ~~> t /\ A. y e. ( 1 [,) +oo ) ( abs ` ( ( seq 1 ( + , F ) ` ( |_ ` y ) ) - t ) ) <_ ( c / ( sqrt ` y ) ) ) ) $.
$d .1. c m t y $.
$d D c m t y $.
$d F c m t y $.
$d L a c m t y $.
$d N c m t y $.
$d W c t $.
$d X a c m t y $.
$d Z m y $.
$d c m ph t $.
